item.title: How to thrive at a technical conference
item.description: I’m at the 2018 Red Hat Summit this week in San Francisco and I am enjoying the interactions between developers, executives, vendors, and engineers.

item.title: How to sell: a guide for technical people
item.description: I’ll admit it right now: I love engaging customers and learning more about how what we do at Rackspace can help their business or ideas take flight.
